metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0703 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: Type confusion in DevTools in Google Chrome prior to 110.0.5481.77 alloweda remote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific UIinteractions to potentially exploit heap corruption via UI interactions.(Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
